title: EXCLUSIVE:  'My Jaw Was Hanging Off My Face' Ted Bundy Survivor on the Horrific Attack
itunes:title: EXCLUSIVE:  'My Jaw Was Hanging Off My Face' Ted Bundy Survivor on the Horrific Attack
description:
Notorious and vile rapist and serial killer, Ted Bundy, confesses to 30 killings. No one can be sure of the actual number. His attacks, violent and vicious. One of the only known survivors of a Bundy attack, Kathy Kleiner, talks with Nancy about that horrific night

Nancy's expert panel also weighs in:

Sheryl McCollum     Cold Case Research Institute Director

Dr. Katherine Ramsland     Professor of Forensic Psychology at DeSales University

Dr. Peter Vronsky     Author of “Sons of Cain: A History of Serial Killers from the Stone Age to the Present"


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
